page.title: 12INDUSTRY
page.content: INDUSTRY IN NORTHWICH IS DOMINATED BY ICI ALTHOUGH THERE ARE MANY OTHER SMALLER INDUSTRIES IN THE AREA. ICI BEGAN IN NORTHWICH AND THERE ARE 3 LARGE CHEMICAL PLANTS IN THE AREA AT PRESENT.THE MAIN REASON FOR ICI BEING IN THE AREA IS THE MINERALS IN THE GROUND.HOWEVER AS THESE HAVE BEEN USED UP THE RAW MATERIALS HAVE BEEN BROUGHT IN FROM OTHER AREAS.ONE OF THE ICI PLANTS WILL SOON SHUT DOWN WHICH WILL MEAN A MOVEMENT OF PRODUCTION TO RUNCORN,A MORE PRACTICAL LOCATION. NORTHWICH GLASS IS A COMPANY WHICH HAS DEVELOPED OVER THE LAST FIFTEEN YEARS AND HAS RECENTLY BOUGHT NEW PREMISES ON A DEVELOPMENT PARK AT THE EDGE OF THE TOWN.MANY OF THE SMALL INDUSTRIES IN NORTHWICH HAVE SOME LINK WITH ICI AND THIS IS THE CASE HERE FOR ICI SEND ASH TO PILKINGTONS GLASS IN ST. HELENS WHO SEND IT TO NORTHWICH GLASS.
